BasicInfo.short: clearXchange is a digital payments network that allows its users to send money to anyone with a U.S. bank account.

Products.name: Person-to-Person (P2P) Payments
Products.description: Enables consumers to send and receive payments easily and securely using an email address or mobile number.

Products.name: Government-to-Consumer (G2C) Payments
Products.description: Enables government entities to send payments to directly to customers safely and conveniently.

Products.name: Business-to-Consumer (B2C) Payments
Products.description: Enables businesses to send payments to directly to customers safely and conveniently.

CurrentTeam.title: Head of Compliance, Risk, and Operations
Head of Business Development and Finance
